com.liferay.neo4j

Class GraphDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.liferay.neo4j.GraphDatabase

  • public class GraphDatabase
extends Object
    GraphDatabase component service which will be registered to the OSGi component service. Provides a basic interface to get a Neo4j server connection and running simple queries.
    Author:
    Mate Thurzo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SESSION_AUTOCLOSE_TIMEOUT
      A basic timeout value after a session is being automatically closed if one of the runStatement methods is being used with the autocloseSession parameter set to true.

    • Field Detail

      • SESSION_AUTOCLOSE_TIMEOUT

        public static final int SESSION_AUTOCLOSE_TIMEOUT
        A basic timeout value after a session is being automatically closed if one of the runStatement methods is being used with the autocloseSession parameter set to true.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • newNeo4jDriver

        public org.neo4j.driver.v1.Driver newNeo4jDriver(String url,
                                                 org.neo4j.driver.v1.AuthToken authToken)
        Acquires a new Neo4j Driver object.
        Parameters:
        url - the server url for a Neo4j database
        authToken - the authentication token for the Neo4j database
        Returns:
        A Neo4j Driver object. This is the Driver object from the official Neo4j driver and it is not wrapped

      • runStatement

        public GraphDatabaseResult runStatement(String url,
                                        String userName,
                                        String password,
                                        String statement)
        Runs a Cypher statement against a Neo4j database. This method opens up a connection with the given connection details, runs the statement and automatically closes the session after the default time defined in SESSION_AUTOCLOSE_TIMEOUT
        Parameters:
        url - the server url for a Neo4j database
        userName - the user name being used for the connection to the database
        password - the password being used for the connection to the database
        statement - the Cypher statement which will be executed on the database
        Returns:
        a result object wrapping the Neo4j StatementResult

      • runStatement

        public GraphDatabaseResult runStatement(String url,
                                        String userName,
                                        String password,
                                        String statement,
                                        boolean autocloseSession)
        Runs a Cypher statement against a Neo4j database. This method opens up a connection with the given connection details, runs the statement and if the autocloseSession parameter is true automatically closes the session after the default time defined in SESSION_AUTOCLOSE_TIMEOUT
        Parameters:
        url - the server url for a Neo4j database
        userName - the user name being used for the connection to the database
        password - the password being used for the connection to the database
        statement - the Cypher statement which will be executed on the database
        autocloseSession - define true if the session needs to be automatically closed after the default timeout
        Returns:
        a result object wrapping the Neo4j StatementResult

      • runStatement

        public GraphDatabaseResult runStatement(String url,
                                        String userName,
                                        String password,
                                        String statement,
                                        boolean autocloseSession,
                                        int autocloseTimeout)
        Runs a Cypher statement against a Neo4j database. This method opens up a connection with the given connection details, runs the statement and if the autocloseSession parameter is true automatically closes the session after the default time defined in the autocloseTimeout parameter.
        Parameters:
        url - the server url for a Neo4j database
        userName - the user name being used for the connection to the database
        password - the password being used for the connection to the database
        statement - the Cypher statement which will be executed on the database
        autocloseSession - define true if the session needs to be automatically closed after the default timeout
        autocloseTimeout - a time value give in milliseconds to automatically close the opened session after
        Returns:
        a result object wrapping the Neo4j StatementResult

      • runStatement

        public GraphDatabaseResult runStatement(String url,
                                        String userName,
                                        String password,
                                        String statement,
                                        Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Runs a Cypher statement with the given parameters against a Neo4j database. This method opens up a connection with the given connection details, This method opens up a connection with the given connection details, runs the statement and automatically closes the session after the default time defined in SESSION_AUTOCLOSE_TIMEOUT
        Parameters:
        url - the server url for a Neo4j database
        userName - the user name being used for the connection to the database
        password - the password being used for the connection to the database
        statement - the Cypher statement which will be executed on the database
        parameters - a parameter map being passed to the database to use with the statement
        Returns:
        a result object wrapping the Neo4j StatementResult

      • runStatement

        public GraphDatabaseResult runStatement(String url,
                                        String userName,
                                        String password,
                                        String statement,
                                        Map<String,Object> parameters,
                                        boolean autocloseSession)
        Runs a Cypher statement with the given parameters against a Neo4j database. This method opens up a connection with the given connection details, runs the statement and if the autocloseSession parameter is true automatically closes the session after the default time defined in SESSION_AUTOCLOSE_TIMEOUT
        Parameters:
        url - the server url for a Neo4j database
        userName - the user name being used for the connection to the database
        password - the password being used for the connection to the database
        statement - the Cypher statement which will be executed on the database
        parameters - a parameter map being passed to the database to use with the statement
        autocloseSession - define true if the session needs to be automatically closed after the default timeout
        Returns:
        a result object wrapping the Neo4j StatementResult

      • runStatement

        public GraphDatabaseResult runStatement(String url,
                                        String userName,
                                        String password,
                                        String statement,
                                        Map<String,Object> parameters,
                                        boolean autocloseSession,
                                        int autocloseTimeout)
        Runs a Cypher statement with the given parameters against a Neo4j database. This method opens up a connection with the given connection details, runs the statement and if the autocloseSession parameter is true automatically closes the session after the default time defined in the autocloseTimeout parameter.
        Parameters:
        url - the server url for a Neo4j database
        userName - the user name being used for the connection to the database
        password - the password being used for the connection to the database
        statement - the Cypher statement which will be executed on the database
        parameters - a parameter map being passed to the database to use with the statement
        autocloseSession - define true if the session needs to be automatically closed after the default timeout
        autocloseTimeout - a time value give in milliseconds to automatically close the opened session after
        Returns:
        a result object wrapping the Neo4j StatementResult

      • endStatement

        public void endStatement(String resultUuid)
        Closes a session previously opened by a runStatement method.
        Parameters:
        resultUuid - the UUID value of the result. This can be obtained from a GraphDatabaseResult object which is a result of a runStatement method
